 Fan Fiction & Website Submissions!

Kree Jaffa!

Hi, My name is Aaron "UV" Mansfield, and im the webmaster at http://www.the5thrace.com, the ultimate SG-1 Fan Base!

At the moment the site doing well and with more help from you the fans, it can improve. I need imput from all you SG-1 fans out there. things i need are:

- Fan Fiction (any kind; slash, straight, etc)
- Photo's from conventions
- Pics of homemade costumes etc
- and WEBSITES to add to my growing directory!

Gaters.net is at the top of my forums directory, and yours could be just as popular.

submit anything you think suitable to:

submit@the5thrace.com

Cheers!
Second Lieutenant AaronUV SG-9 A&R

 Spam?

It was not my intention to "spam" anyone. for some reason my URL is down and im fixing it now. So try it again at a later date.

In the mean time:

Ive been looking up stuff a lot latley regarding the new season and the movie. Michael Shanks told us the smallest pieces of info at the BOBW convention in sydney Australia, but since then ive wanted to find out more.

Ive read some goods articles around the place about daniels departure, but does anyone from the world of SG-1 fan fiction have a good "daniel leaving" fanfic?

Cheers!
